item.title: WATCH: Meerkat siblings wrestle at zoo
item.description: These little meerkat siblings were captured wrestling in a tube at the Oakland Zoo in California.

item.title: Trump admin live updates: Judge releases 2 migrants, rips evidence in TdA gang case
item.description: He headed to the new military immigration enforcement area without reporters.

item.title: Trump says he wants a Russia-Ukraine deal in '2 weeks or less'
item.description: President Donald Trump told reporters on Sunday he wants to see a deal between Russia and Ukraine "in two weeks or less."

item.title: Noem says Secret Service arrested the person who stole her bag
item.description: DHS Secretary Noem said Sunday that the Secret Service caught the person who swiped her bag from a DC restaurant on Easter Sunday while she was dining...

item.title: Myrtle Beach shooting leaves 11 wounded, police fatally shoot 1
item.description: A shooting in the popular South Carolina tourist town of Myrtle Beach left 11 people wounded, and police fatally shot one person
